List footprint summary metrics

Source: R/list_fs.R
get_fs_metrics.Rd

Helper functions to list footprint metric names and units

get_fs_metrics(short_names, group = NULL)

list_fs(col_names = NULL)

get_fs_units(metrics = NULL)

get_fs_group(metrics = NULL)

Arguments

short_names

Character vector of short names to lookup fs_ function names.
group

Character vector to return a group of metrics (e.g. "area").
col_names

Character vector to select columns from the table of metrics.
metrics

Character vector of fs_ function names to look up the default units.

Value

Vector or data.frame with selected footprint metric function names and/or units.

Details

These convenience function access the internal data in foot::fs_footprint_metrics. They provide easy look-up access for the function names, the default units of measurement, or to return columns. Arguments are optional and if omitted the full set of metrics will be returned.

Contents

Developed by WorldPop Research Group, University of Southampton, Chris Jochem.
